card.name: CW / CC - Image Viewer Limitations Per Client

data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth @stefanbar 

I am not sure how we are going to cater for Index 360 and MBOD as we don't extract those records yet nor do we have any idea/structure/spec of how the fields will be extracted.

The options on Stefan's screenshot will not work for those records.
 We might have to put more thought into this feature if we include Index360 and MBOD as the DB structure will have to be built differently should we include them.
